summary: A test suite that verifies DeepSpeed training of a wav2vec2 speech model across different precision modes (FP16, FP32) and execution contexts (distributed and non‑distributed), using helper utilities to launch and run the trainer and validate outcomes.
business_intent: Guarantee that DeepSpeed‑accelerated wav2vec2 training works correctly and efficiently in various deployment scenarios, reducing risk and supporting scalable production speech‑recognition pipelines.
